image.altText: Constable Randall Kirk walking in front of two other men wearing a blazer with a police name badge pinned onto it and glasses.

props.synopsis: Footage from Constable Randall Kirk's body worn camera shows him hiding behind a tree and running to the police car to escape the property at Wieambilla.Â

title.children: 'He's coming over': Footage shows officer hiding behind tree before fleeing scene of Wieambilla shooting

image.altText: A Rex Airlines plane stands on a runway.

props.synopsis: Rex Airlines, Australia's largest regional and domestic airline operator, enters administration with domestic 737 services grounded and Virgin Australia offering free rebooking.

title.children: Rex Airlines enters voluntary administration but regional routes continuing to operate

image.altText: Jess Fox competing in C1 canoe slalom heats at Paris Olympics.

props.synopsis: Jess Fox's hopes of winning a second gold at the Paris Olympics remain on track, while Australia will play for bronze in the women's rugby sevens after Canada scores an upset win. Follow live.

title.children: Fox in contention for more gold after making C1 semis, Aussies go down in shock rugby sevens loss

liveBlogKeyEvents.title: Rugby sevens: Aussies out of contention for gold as Canada scores upset win
Tennis: Alexei Popyrin wins second round singles match
Shooting: Australian out in first round of Trap final

image.altText: A woman with blonde hair wearing a dark blazer answers questions from a reporter in a corridor.

props.synopsis: Australian politicians have taken aim at Qantas over the downfall of Rex Airlines but an aviation analysts says the regional carrier itself is to blame.

title.children: Qantas has 'enacted retribution' on Rex Airlines, says Shadow transport minister

image.altText: A young woman holding a black and white photo of her mother.

props.synopsis: Romany Wake and Shakira Robertson used to be next door neighbours. Now they're trying to support each other after both their mothers were killed tragically in separate incidents.

title.children: 'I've just killed your mum': Romany Wake's father committed murder, then told her to call triple-0

image.altText: A person in blue forensics suit walks behind police tape on the Cairns esplanade

props.synopsis: A mother tells a Supreme Court trial her eldest daughter struck her from behind and attacked her with a weapon after she fled an abusive 22-year relationship with the young woman's father.

title.children: Mother tells court she felt pain like 'hot coffee' when daughter allegedly attacked with box cutter

image.altText: A police officer carrying a bunch of flowers looks down

props.synopsis: Taylor Swift pays tribute to the children killed and injured in a stabbing attack at a dance class being held to her music on Monday, saying she's "completely in shock", as the death toll from the incident rises.

title.children: 'Completely in shock': Taylor Swift pays tribute to children killed in UK stabbing attack at dance class as death toll rises

image.altText: Two female rugby players in Australian colours contest the ball against a rival player.

props.synopsis: Jason Levi and Andrew Goodman are from different states, but they have one very special thing in common â both are watching not one but two of their children representing Australia on the world stage.

title.children: Proud dads of Olympic siblings reflect on the road to Paris

image.altText: A woman and a teenage girl smiling.

props.synopsis: Emma Kuveya's quick thinking to grab an unconscious bus driver's foot off the accelerator has been recognised with an award.

title.children: When Emma's school bus driver had a heart attack, she took the wheel

image.altText: Houses under construction on a bright, sunny day

props.synopsis:
New data issued by the Australian Bureau of Statistics show the total number of dwellings approved in June fell by 6.5 per cent. Some experts are calling on Australia to adopt more alternative construction models.


Â

title.children: Construction body says Australia will struggle to build 1.2 million new homes if building approvals don't improve

image.altText: Kamala Harris, in a beige suite, looks over her shoulders at the top of aircraft stairs

props.synopsis: North Carolina Governor Roy Cooper and Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer are both out of the race to become Kamala Harris's running mate.

title.children: Kamala Harris running mate race narrows, with two more candidates out

image.altText: An aerial shot shows mourners from the Druze minority surrounding five white coffins.

props.synopsis: Israel promised to make Hezbollah pay for the strike in Majdal Shams, but as the war in Gaza drags on it finds itself in a tough position.

title.children: Israel thought two unusual security strategies kept it safe. Here's why they may no longer work

image.altText: An aurora visible on the horizon, over water.

props.synopsis: The stunning weather event that delighted stargazers around the world returns to Australian skies, with the geomagnetic storm expected to be at its strongest on Tuesday evening but lasting for several days.

title.children: Aurora australis lights up the sky as BOM forecasts significant geomagnetic activity

image.altText: Two policemen watch as a yellow crane truck lifts a metal box in grassland.

props.synopsis: The murder convictions of three men jailed over the killing of two people who were locked inside a toolbox and submerged in a dam south of Brisbane five years ago, have been overturned on appeal.

title.children: Murder convictions of three men jailed over alleged toolbox killings overturned on appeal

image.altText: A woman holds her arm to her forehead while laying on a bed.

props.synopsis: Australian women with menopause are leaving the workforce early over a lack of support, Australian unions tell a Senate inquiry into menopause and perimenopause. They're calling for 10 days paid leave to help keep them at work.Â

title.children: Australian unions call for 10 days paid reproductive leave to support women with menopause

image.altText: Four men and a woman pose in an aquatics centre.

props.synopsis: Bob Ballard says he is sorry if his comment on the Australian women swim team, which was criticised for being sexist, caused offence to some people.Â

title.children: Commentator responds after removal from Olympics over gendered comment on Australian swimmers

image.altText: A text message inducement to gamble sent by Sportsbet

props.synopsis: Gambling inducements are banned in many countries and a parliamentary committee has recommended Australia follow suit, but more than a year later nothing has happened.

title.children: Callum stopped gambling a year ago. Sportsbet is still trying to lure him back

image.altText: firefighters on a fire truck crane fighting a house fire while neighbours look on

props.synopsis: Paramedics say a 32-year-old woman was pulled from a Varsity Lakes home with life-threatening burns to much of her body.

title.children: Firefighters pull severely injured woman from burning Gold Coast home

image.altText: David Crisafulli graphic

props.synopsis: The man likely to become Queensland's next premier touts his time in small business, but an ABC examination has uncovered liquidators' claims a training organisation he was directing may have been trading insolvent.

title.children: Opposition Leader David Crisafulli ran a training company liquidators believed may have been trading insolvent

image.altText: Close up of Queensland police logo on side of police car

props.synopsis: Queensland police allege the men took the woman against her will from a residence in Morningside before taking her to two addresses, demanding money.Â

title.children: Two men charged for allegedly kidnapping a woman and beating her with a cricket bat east of Brisbane

image.altText: A firefighter silhouetted against a wall of flame by the side of the road

props.synopsis: The fire sparked by the car is now the sixth largest wildfire in Californian history, across more than 149,000 hectares and only 12 per cent contained.Â

title.children: California is facing one of the biggest fires in its history. Investigators say one man is responsible

image.altText: Tahiti

props.synopsis: It has broken the record for an Olympic venue being the longest distance away from a host city, and Teahupo'o is providing a spectacular backdrop to one of the newest events at the Games.

title.children: Cruise ship accommodation and the 'pile of skulls' â the Olympics surfing venue is one of the most unique in history

image.altText: Collingwood CEO Craig Kelly.

props.synopsis: The Collingwood Football Club is facing new allegations of racism, with its chief executive officer Craig Kelly accused of making slurs and jokes about Indigenous culture.

title.children: Collingwood Football Club taken to court over racial discrimination allegations

image.altText: A police car parked across a highway

props.synopsis: A 25-year-old man pleads guilty just hours after being charged with trying to kill another man by hitting him with his car and striking him with a hammer, which left the victim's leg severed.

title.children: Perth man pleads guilty to 'heinous' attempted murder of man whose leg was severed in attack

image.altText: Simone leans over onto the beam and has a look of immense concentration, wearing a blue and red US leotard.

props.synopsis: She's the most decorated gymnast of all time â but even Simone Biles has fallen victim to this little-known mental block.Â

title.children: How Simone Biles overcame 'the twisties' to compete for Olympic gold

image.altText: Ryan Murphy hugs his wife in the stands. She holds a sign reading "Ryan It's A Girl"

props.synopsis: That's the surprise message that American swimmer Ryan Murphy got from the pool deck as he looked up at his wife in the stands at the Paris Olympics.

title.children: 'It's a girl!' Olympian discovers gender of unborn child while standing on Paris podium

image.altText: Trump standing in front of a rally of supporters with his fist raised, wearing a blue suit and red MAGA hat

props.synopsis: The FBI says a local police officer took a photo of gunman Thomas Crooks and sent it to other law enforcement officials at the scene of Donald Trump's Pennsylvania rally before the shooting took place.Â

title.children: US police photographed Trump shooter more than an hour before assassination attempt

image.altText: Michele Bullock, looking at journalists, wearing a light blazer, standing at a podium, during a press conference

props.synopsis: Ahead of its meeting next week, the RBA has effectively talked itself into a corner: should it come good on its threats of a rate hike if inflation comes in hotter than expected, or will it choose to maintain its apparent reluctance to push rates even higher?

title.children: Why the RBA should hold off on rate hikes

image.altText: Two men in rain jackets, walk with a woman who is carrying a child through the mud.

props.synopsis: Local authorities say rescue operations have been hampered after a main bridge collapsed in the region.

title.children: Multiple landslides in India's Kerala state kill at least 93 and injure over 70 with hundreds missing

image.altText: A man wearing red holds two children, in front of a boat floating on brown water.

props.synopsis: China's southern Hunan province has suffered several days of heavy rain and flooding as remnants of the now-weakened Typhoon Gaemi continue to lash the country.

title.children: Weakened Typhoon Gaemi brings torrential rain to China, death toll rises

image.altText: Paul Dietze

props.synopsis: As dangerous new opioids arrive on Australian streets, experts are calling for more frontline workers to be issued with naloxone, a medicine that can halt drug overdoses.

title.children: Calls for more frontline workers to be armed with drug-overdose-fighting medicine

image.altText: James O'Brien smiles while standing in front of a sandy beach in Sydney. He's holding crutches and wearing his prosthetic leg.

props.synopsis: A year since my amputation, I'm marking my "stumpiversary" (as it's sometimes called in the amputee community) and I'm feeling both optimistic and reflective.

title.children: A year ago I became an amputee. Here's how my life has changed
